1.12.2.1.4.10: EU2 integration, PSL integration. Creative tab. Config file changes. Enderfuge recipe is ore-dict. Creative tab.

1.12.2.1.4.6: Clean up, updated JEI/Forge/CTD Core, added Horse Armors to be smelted
1.12.2.1.4.4: Fixed bug where removing a smelting recipe would just remove a fuel.
1.12.2.1.4.3: More/new IMC stuff. Redid textures. More fuel. More smeltables.

1.12.2.1.2: Styling fixes, update CTD Core to 1.2
1.12.2.1.1.9: Fixes inconsistencies between how pipes/hoppers would act on the Enderfuge compared to a furnace.
